sn4.18:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava magadhesu viharati pancasalayam brahmanagame.
sn4.18:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena pancasalayam brahmanagame kumarikanam pahunakani bhavanti.
sn4.18:1.3: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya pancasalam brahmanagamam pindaya pavisi.
sn4.18:1.4: Tena kho pana samayena pancasaleyyaka brahmanagahapatika marena papimata anvavittha bhavanti:
sn4.18:2.1: Atha kho bhagava yathadhotena pattena pancasalam brahmanagamam pindaya pavisi tathadhotena pattena patikkami.
sn4.18:2.2: Atha kho maro papima yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn4.18:2.4: “Tatha nu tvam, papima, akasi yathaham pindam na labheyyan”ti.
sn4.18:2.5: “Tena hi, bhante, bhagava dutiyampi pancasalam brahmanagamam pindaya pavisatu.
sn4.18:2.6: Tathaham karissami yatha bhagava pindam lacchati”ti.
sn4.18:5.1: Atha kho maro papima “janati mam bhagava, janati mam sugato”ti dukkhi dummano tatthevantaradhayiti.
